comment_general: All options are 'true' or 'false'. BTW ignore these 'comment_XXX' entries - JSON has no other way to do comments!!
comment_saveJSON: Start with save JSON ticked in Setup
comment_showOutlines: Should the control animations have a white outline
comment_verbose: Should various debug be printed to the text console
comment_autosend: After how many milliseconds to re-check for control updates and poss send. 0 = manual
